name: Paper Dungeon
description:
This game was initially developed in 2010 and then updated slowly. Now I decided to continue the development.
Every texture is handdrawn.
The game is a mix of fighting, exploring, surviving and solving enigmas with this "weird" graphic style I want to obtain.

Features:

  • First levels are tutorial tunnels
  • Dungeons are mazes
  • Traps everywhere
  • Enigmas
  • Saving progress and other stuff requires collecting some resources
  • Handdrawn graphic
  • Enemies (dumb like bricks) and bosses
  • A lot of things to prevent you get to the end of the game!
  • Multilanguage (ITALIAN and ENGLISH)

A new updated DEMO with more and more levels is coming out... Stay tuned!
